name: customer-groups-api
notes: The Customer Groups API lets you create and manage customer groups to provide targeted promotions or take other customized actions based on customers' group memberships.

endpoints.name: List customer groups
endpoints.notes: Retrieves the list of customer groups of a business.

endpoints.name: Create customer group
endpoints.notes: Creates a new customer group for a business. The request must include the name value of the group.

endpoints.name: Delete customer group
endpoints.notes: Deletes a customer group as identified by the group_id value.

endpoints.name: Retrieve customer group
endpoints.notes: Retrieves a specific customer group as identified by the group_id value.

endpoints.name: Update customer group
endpoints.notes: Updates a customer group as identified by the group_id value.
